bioconda.name: migraine
bioconda.summary: Implements coalescent algorithms for maximum likelihood analysis of population genetic data. The data currently  handled are allelic counts but sequences will be handled in the forthcoming version.

biocontainers.name: migraine
biocontainers.summary: Implements coalescent algorithms for maximum likelihood analysis of population genetic data. The data currently  handled are allelic counts but sequences will be handled in the forthcoming version.
